title: Recycle Track Systems acquires leading Canadian waste services provider RecycleSmart Solutions, Inc. - PR Newswire
summary: Recycle Track Systems, Inc. has acquired RecycleSmart Solutions, expanding its portfolio of IoT smart waste products. The acquisition includes the Pello waste sensor technology, enabling Recycle Track Systems to offer comprehensive sustainability solutions across North America.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 562111 - Solid Waste Collection, 562119 - Other Waste Collection, 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services
